title: Win Utility Toolkit
description: This plugin facilitates window management and manipulation.
longDescription:
This plugin allows manipulation of the game window within the Unreal Engine on the Windows platform. It includes functions for minimizing, maximizing, hiding, showing, resizing, moving, and modifying the window title. Additionally, it offers the ability to set the window as always on top, retrieve window position and size, adjust opacity, and display system notifications with confirmation. The plugin provides easy access to window operations, useful for creating user interfaces or visual effects within games.


Support (Discord): >>> HERE <<<

Documentation: >>> HERE <<<

Example of use: >>> HERE <<<


📣Check the blueprints assets: >>>HERE<<<


Additionally, the plugin provides a function for displaying Windows notifications with confirmation, allowing interaction with the user through message boxes.


This plugin only uses standard Windows API functions and Unreal Engine libraries, and does not incorporate any third-party software or libraries.
technicalDetails:
✅Features:

  • Minimize Window: Minimizes the specified window.
  • Toggle Maximize Window: Toggles between maximizing and restoring the specified window.
  • Is Window Maximized: Checks if the specified window is currently maximized.
  • Hide Window: Hides the specified window from view.
  • Show Window: Shows the specified window if it was previously hidden.
  • Resize Window: Changes the size of the specified window to the given dimensions.
  • Move Window: Moves the specified window to the given coordinates.
  • Get Window Title: Get the title of the specified window.
  • Set Window Title: Sets the title of the specified window to the provided string.
  • Set Window Always On Top: Sets whether the specified window should always be on top of other windows.
  • Get Window Position: Get the position of the specified window on the screen.
  • Get Window Size: Get the size of the specified window.
  • Set Window Opacity: Adjusts the opacity (transparency) of the specified window.
  • Display Windows Notification with Confirmation: Shows a system notification with a confirmation prompt.


Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 2

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64
